newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Trygg-Hansa finalises Danish insurer buy.
newsitem.headline: Trygg-Hansa finalises Danish insurer buy.

text.p: Swedish insurance company Trygg-Hansa AB said on Thursday it had finalised the purchase of Danish insurance company Tell Direkte Forsikring without any complications.

"Following an analysis -- so called due diligence -- of Danish insurers Tell Direkte Forsikring, which showed no complications, Trygg-Hansa signed a final contract to buy the company," Trygg-Hansa said in a statement.
Tell Direkte Forsikring was started in 1992 and has premium volumes of 100 million Danish crowns annually.
The company announced earlier this month it would be taken over by Trygg-Hansa subject to the approval of the Danish authorities and a due dilligence phase.
